version_description:
- cards show on start to help new user
- preview images in layer editor
- better watch sync method
- bug fixes
- added Russian localization

- New dashboard on watch app for quick access to activity information
- added a Moon Phase layer
- Bugfixes

- new watch app functionality to remote control full screen clocks on the phone app
- added two new fonts for creating more dynamic clocks

- add custom fonts to clocks to add more design capabilities and support other characters and languages
- support for larger images
- bug fixes and stability improvements

- support for daily and hourly weather
- bug fixes

- performance fixes
- bugFix for weather display

- bug fixes related to Clockology+
- faster weather refresh

- localizations and bugfixes
- added a new option to use current heading for Watch App forward and backward

- faster clock rendering and clock loading
- less power usage while app is in the background
- more Chinese language translations

- fixes for crashing with video layers
- fix for a crash with time travel and distance health labels

- smaller text/icons are now sharper on smaller screens
- added nighttime moon for partly cloudy weather condition
- significantly fewer redraws for certain layer types to decrease battery and CPU usage
- many other great performance and bug fixes
- hot fix for lines on edges of images with small screens

1.4.3 Whats new:
- weather icon for night partly cloudy
- weather descriptions for properly for future times ( daily and hourly )
- utility layer battery selections will now work better with custom fonts
- new settings option to allow for export designs as OpenClockStandard files. This will allow for clock designs to be saved out as standard JSON files to be used in other hardware and software projects. Search "OpenClockStandard" on github.
- performance and bug fixes
